79be80b5-d274-409f-96c2-e7fee4e56d5a.description: The earner of this badge was a part of the 2021 class and has an understanding of Design Thinking Methods & Mindsets, specifically the design thinking process and how to apply design thinking strategies & techniques. And, they have been engaged and active contributors to the overall program.

e11195d1-d0bc-433f-ba5a-11386468d127.description: For this Akkodis Cloud Academy beginner level badge, the earner was part of a self paced fully virtual course and completed a knowledge check. The course includes: understanding the concept of cloud, how the 'cloud' was created and the evolution over time. It covers the types of roles you may have in the cloud space and information around them. There is also a deep dive around cloud use cases that Akkodis have implemented.
e11195d1-d0bc-433f-ba5a-11386468d127.name: Akkodis Cloud Academy Beginner level

fe421aa0-f454-44cf-9659-0f05d5e9839e.description: For this Modis Business Analysis Practitioner badge the earner has an understanding of IIBA BABOK v3 - knowledge areas, techniques, and perspectives to be able to apply when undertaking business analysis. fe421aa0-f454-44cf-9659-0f05d5e9839e.name: Modis Business Analysis Practitioner

68468bc0-e36d-49d3-8e70-c5ef4a9ec1a6.description: The aim of the Academy RAMS program is to create key and specialized competencies in the railway RAMS management sector. The training program is structured in 3 modules that cover from theoretical to the practical to ensure consultants know all the relevant topics of the sector and put them into practice by working in a real team.The total number of hours of the program consists of 370 hours divided in the different modules (theoretical, theoretical-practical and practical).
68468bc0-e36d-49d3-8e70-c5ef4a9ec1a6.name: RAMS: Railway - Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of Academy RAMS Training Program with at least 90% attendance of sessions (live or recorded). All development has been supervised following a specific methodology to ensure the knowledge and evolution of each of the consultants.
Completed and passed the exams
Demonstrate curiosity about Railway sector during the program and pro-activity participate in the practical part of the program with the project team.

skills.name: Reliability Availability Maintainability And Safety Software

57e8715f-5c0f-42f4-9546-e9adb99ba41c.description: The aim of the Academy AERO program is to create key and specialized competencies in systems engineering within the aerospace sector. The training program is structured in 3 modules that cover from theoretical to the practical to ensure consultants know all the relevant topics of the sector and put them into practice by working in a real team.The total number of hours of the program consists of 370 hours divided in the different modules (theoretical, theoretical-practical and practical).
57e8715f-5c0f-42f4-9546-e9adb99ba41c.name: Systems engineering: Aerospace & Defense

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of Academy AERO Training Program with at least 90% attendance of sessions (live or recorded). All development has been supervised following a specific methodology to ensure the knowledge and evolution of each of the consultants.
Completed and passed the exams
Demonstrate curiosity about Aerospace sector during the program and pro-activity participate in the practical part of the program with the project team.

38ef5c18-c766-4535-86d2-1ab29334bec5.description: The V&V program is to create key and specialized competencies in the railway Verification and Validation sector. The program has been structured in 3 modules that cover from theoretical to practical so that the consultants understand all the relevant topics of the sector and put them into practice by working in a real team. The total number of hours of the program consists of 320 hours divided in the different modules (theoretical, theoretical-practical and practical).
38ef5c18-c766-4535-86d2-1ab29334bec5.name: Verification & Validation: Railway - Practitioner

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of Verification & Validation Railway Training Program with at least 90% attendance of sessions (live or recorded). Completed and passed the exams

683f24dd-c5be-4bb2-af7d-112601a7f676.description: Earners of this badge are application analysts who successfully completed a 6-8 week remote classroom training program facilitated by Epic. At the end of the course, the analysts were certified by Epic to work on build, test and release tasks within their specific system modules, e.g. Cupid, Social Care, Ambulatory, Wisdom, etc. To receive EPR certification, earners were required to a pass a proctor-led exam with a score of 80% or higher.
683f24dd-c5be-4bb2-af7d-112601a7f676.name: Modis Academy Certified EPR Application Analyst - EpicCare Ambulatory

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of Learning Path Modules per Team (Cupid, Ambulatory, Wisdom)

Each analyst is assessed by remote proctor using Examity portal; Receive at least 80% pass score and email notification from Epic of certification (limit of 3 attempts to pass exam)

9bcc99b6-14a9-471d-b48a-1cc25a41aa4b.description: Earners of this badge are application analysts who successfully completed a 6-8 week remote classroom training program facilitated by Epic. At the end of the course, the analysts were certified by Epic to work on build, test and release tasks within their specific system modules, e.g. Cupid, Social Care, Ambulatory, Wisdom, etc. To receive EPR certification, earners were required to a pass a proctor-led exam with a score of 80% or higher.
9bcc99b6-14a9-471d-b48a-1cc25a41aa4b.name: Modis Academy Certified EPR Application Analyst - Compass Rose

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of Learning Path Modules per Team (Cupid, Ambulatory, Wisdom)
Learning Path includes Project material to complete for each Team
Each analyst is assessed by remote proctor using Examity portal; Receive at least 80% pass score and email notification from Epic of certification (limit of 3 attempts to pass exam)
